prompts: Create a bat-like Pokemon with purple wings and a scorpion tail.
I want a flying-type Pokemon that has a sleek body and bright yellow eyes.
Generate a dual-type Pokemon that combines ground and flying elements in its design.
Make a creature that resembles a mix between a bat and a scorpion with striking colors.
Imagine a Pokemon that can glide through forests with its large wings and agile movements.
Design a Pokemon that has a unique shape, featuring a combination of insect and mammal traits.
Show me a Pokemon with a dark, mysterious aura and vibrant accents in its color palette.
